attributes.action: SCRAP THE SMOKING BAN IN THE UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I DONT EVEN SMOKE. AND I THINK ITS JUST ANOTHER WAY THAT THE GOVERMENT HAS CONTROL ON PEOPLE. TELLING THEM WHAT THEY CAN AND CAN NOT DO

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
